languages.text: "Я... боюсь тебе отвечать. Что, если я скажу: "нет, не слышала"? На всякий случай прокипятишь мне мозги, чтобы проверить, не вру ли я?"
"I'm... afraid to give you an answer. If I say, 'No, I haven't heard anything,' will you boil my brains to see if I'm lying, just in case?"
languages.original_text: "Я... боюсь тебе отвечать. Что, если я скажу: "нет, не слышала"? На всякий случай прокипятишь мне мозги, чтобы проверить, не вру ли я?"

traits.locale_text: "I'm... afraid to give you an answer. If I say, 'No, I haven't heard anything,' will you boil my brains to see if I'm lying, just in case?"
"I'm... afraid to give you an answer. If I say, 'No, I haven't heard anything,' will you boil my brains to see if I'm lying, just in case?"
"I'm... afraid to give you an answer. If I say, 'No, I haven't heard anything,' will you boil my brains to see if I'm lying, just in case?"
"I'm... afraid to give you an answer. If I say, 'No, I haven't heard anything,' will you boil my brains to see if I'm lying, just in case?"

languages.text: “我……恐怕没办法给你答案。以防万一，我想先问一下：如果我说‘没有，我什么都没听到’，你会不会煮沸我的脑子，看看我有没有撒谎？”
languages.original_text: "I'm... afraid to give you an answer. If I say, 'No, I haven't heard anything,' will you boil my brains to see if I'm lying, just in case?"

traits.locale_text: “我……恐怕没办法给你答案。以防万一，我想先问一下：如果我说‘没有，我什么都没听到’，你会不会煮沸我的脑子，看看我有没有撒谎？”

languages.text: « J'ai... peur de vous répondre. Si je vous dis que non, je n'ai rien entendu, qui me dit que vous n'allez pas mettre ma cervelle sur le gril pour savoir si je mens ? »
languages.original_text: "I'm... afraid to give you an answer. If I say, 'No, I haven't heard anything,' will you boil my brains to see if I'm lying, just in case?"

traits.locale_text: « J'ai... peur de vous répondre. Si je vous dis que non, je n'ai rien entendu, qui me dit que vous n'allez pas mettre ma cervelle sur le gril pour savoir si je mens ? »

languages.text: «Me... da miedo responder. Si te digo que "No, no he oído nada", ¿vas a intentar hervirme los sesos para ver si miento por si acaso?».
languages.original_text: "I'm... afraid to give you an answer. If I say, 'No, I haven't heard anything,' will you boil my brains to see if I'm lying, just in case?"

traits.locale_text: «Me... da miedo responder. Si te digo que "No, no he oído nada", ¿vas a intentar hervirme los sesos para ver si miento por si acaso?».

languages.text: 「私は…答えるのが怖いの。”何も聞いてない”と言えば、私が嘘をついていないか調べるのに、念のためこの脳を煮詰めるつもりでしょう？」
languages.original_text: "I'm... afraid to give you an answer. If I say, 'No, I haven't heard anything,' will you boil my brains to see if I'm lying, just in case?"

traits.locale_text: 「私は…答えるのが怖いの。”何も聞いてない”と言えば、私が嘘をついていないか調べるのに、念のためこの脳を煮詰めるつもりでしょう？」

languages.text: "Ich ... habe Angst, Euch zu antworten. Wenn ich sage, dass ich nichts gehört habe, kocht Ihr dann mein Hirn, um zu sehen, ob ich lüge?"
languages.original_text: "I'm... afraid to give you an answer. If I say, 'No, I haven't heard anything,' will you boil my brains to see if I'm lying, just in case?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich ... habe Angst, Euch zu antworten. Wenn ich sage, dass ich nichts gehört habe, kocht Ihr dann mein Hirn, um zu sehen, ob ich lüge?"

languages.original_text: "I'm... afraid to give you an answer. If I say, 'No, I haven't heard anything,' will you boil my brains to see if I'm lying, just in case?"

languages.text: "Ben... Cevap vermekten korkuyorum. 'Hayır, duymadım.' desem yalan söyleyip söylemediğimi anlamak için beynimi çıkarıp parçalara ayırmayacağını nereden bileceğim?"
languages.original_text: "I'm... afraid to give you an answer. If I say, 'No, I haven't heard anything,' will you boil my brains to see if I'm lying, just in case?"

traits.locale_text: "Ben... Cevap vermekten korkuyorum. 'Hayır, duymadım.' desem yalan söyleyip söylemediğimi anlamak için beynimi çıkarıp parçalara ayırmayacağını nereden bileceğim?"
